attributes.additional_details: Family Court Judge's should be able to pass on sensitive information to Police once they have found all Allegations 'Proven' on 'Child Sex Abuse' otherwise there are no conquenceses & person/person's responsible will not be known to Police or Public & be free to apply for jobs,etc working with 'Children'...'CRB' check's will show nothing...Law need's to change & at the very least person/person's be put on the 'Sex Offenders Register' in the insterest of the public...
